column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This place is the sh*t. The food is incredible
column2: the whiskey selection is a dream come true
column3: and the service is always spot on. For my latest visit
column4: we had Terry as a server
column5: and he was awesome and made the best recommendations. If you come here and do not get the Pulled Pork Hush Puppies
column6: your life is not complete. Haha. Seriously though
column7: they are heaven in your mouth. I also ordered the Chef's burger
column8: and it easily competes as one of the best burgers I've ever had. Two thumbs way way up for all things this place delivers. And now
column9: home to slip into a sweet and beautiful food coma.
